doc.field: Brooklyn Bridge golden anniversary dinner seating list
Brooklyn Bridge golden anniversary dinner seating list

A printed, alphabetical list of attendees and their seat placements at a banquet at the the Grand Ball Room, Hotel St. George, Brooklyn, NY. The event commemorated the 50th anniversary of the Brooklyn Bridge, which opened in 1883.
